group_1.textLeft: Now that you mention it, Miss Nanase…
What did you wish for when you@became a Magical Girl?
If I’m not mistaken, you’ve been a student council@member since middle school.
Even in Mizuna, you were known for being@quite the young lady growing up.

group_1.textRight: Yes… well, I was blessed with@a wonderful household.
Huh, I thought Tsukuyo's school was full of rich girls.

group_1.textLeft: There are indeed many girls who come from@high-class families, but Miss Nanase is still pretty@close to the top of the list.

group_1.textRight: …Even if that’s the case, I’m still, no doubt,@merely on the “bottom of the top”!
Akatsuki-senpai is a true lady, though.

group_1.textLeft: Still, Miss Nanase, your parents are both upstanding@people, and your grades are well up there, right?

group_1.textRight: You could say they’re up there, but in the upper@echelon, I’m definitely down there.
I believe the only thing I’m first in my class is@my hair length…

group_1.textLeft: Ah… Now that I look at it closely, it’s pretty long!

group_1.textRight: Everyone reacts like that. It isn’t something that@stands out or leaves any lasting impressions.

group_1.textLeft: …I don’t think you need to be so modest.

group_1.textRight: That’s right.
Maybe you're much more of a lady and an honor@student than you think you are.

group_1.textLeft: I agree.

group_1.textRight: …I do think that I was blessed in many ways@during my upbringing.
But one day, um… in spite of all that luxury,
when I thought of how from then on, rather than@moving forward with my own strength,
I would instead be riding the train toward the future@on the tracks built by my parents,
I started to feel like I wasn’t really “living” at all…
That’s when I encountered them.

group_1.textLeft: Kyubey?

group_1.textRight: No, medal games.

group_1.textLeft: …Medal games?

group_1.narration: When I abandon myself in@an all or nothing, do-or-die game,@I can forget for a moment@about my boring daily life.
So… going to the game center@after school to play medal games@became a hobby of mine.
―Yukika―@I even secretly bought a casino set,@and now stare at it at home every night…

group_1.textLeft: …Your escape from reality, I see.

group_1.textRight: Exactly.

group_1.textLeft: You derailed with all your might, and that’s@the worst you can do… you really are a true lady.

group_1.textRight: I… I wonder if that’s true…?

group_1.narration: ―Yukika―@Then one day, one of the prize stuffed animals@accosted me.
“Make a contract with me,@and become a Magical Girl!”

group_1.textLeft: So the one who slipped in with@the other stuffed toys…
…was Kyubey.

group_1.textRight: Yes… the first thing I questioned was my own sanity.
But the strange creature in front of me certainly@seemed to exist,
so I thought it was a lifelike dream or something,@and made a wish.
“It’s just a dream anyway. Even if it’s a bit@embarrassing, it’s fine if I said it out loud…”
…that’s what I thought.

group_1.textLeft: Why?

group_1.textRight: *Whimper* I'm still embarrassed whenever@I remember it…

group_1.textCenter: I don’t want this boring but happy life
where I continue to follow the tracks@set by my parents forever.

group_1.textLeft: Is it really that embarrassing?

group_1.textRight: I am embarrassed to be such a totally sheltered@pipe-dreamer…

group_1.textLeft: I understand that a little…@So then, your wish came true.

group_1.textRight: Yes. Ever since then,
I am always getting caught up in@some kind of trouble!

group_1.textLeft: So you're not as bored as you were before@you made the wish.

group_1.textRight: That's right.
It’s like being thrown into a chaotic, messy situation
where pretty much your only way out@is to make a run for it,
and after a moment on the verge of death,@you can finally come back alive.

group_1.textLeft: So, you paid the price of the fate of a Magical Girl…
…only to get a day-to-day dance with death@in exchange?

group_1.textRight: Yes…
But, every time I find myself in a situation@where I think “Maybe this is the end!”,
It's not like I wasn't feeling a bit of a thrill...[chara:301701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301701:lipSynch_1]@or maybe I was?

group_1.textLeft: Huuuh?
…She’s a little scary, isn’t she?

group_1.textRight: Yeah… very unusual.

group_1.textLeft: So today, the one who dragged Miss Nanase@into this new round of trouble is this little Kyubey…
…Is that right?

group_1.textRight: …I believe so.

group_1.textCenter: Was it a good idea... to have made the contract…?
